text: Guido Gorgatti (5 December 1919 – 11 May 2023) was an Italian-born Argentine movie and television actor. His career began in 1935. Gorgatti is known for his roles in Somos todos inquilinos (1954), El Gaucho (1964) and Mingo y Aníbal contra los fantasmas (1985).«La trayectoria de un actor con carisma» , artículo en el diario La Nación Gorgatti was born in Rovigo, Italy. He was raised in Buenos Aires.«Guido Gorgatti, un actor de trayectoria», artículo en el sitio web InfoRegión (Gran Buenos Aires) Gorgatti turned 100 in December 2019, and died on 11 May 2023 in Buenos Aires at the age of 103. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1919 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:People from Veneto Category:Actors from Buenos Aires
title: Guido Gorgatti
